subject: Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The Mets and the New York City Blood Center are holding a blood drive at Shea Stadium on Monday. All donors will receive a voucher for two tickets for a select game in April. The drive will be held between Gates C and D from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. Donors must be at least 17 years old and 110 pounds.
